ProductFeaturedProduct.name: ProductFeaturedProduct
ProductFeaturedProduct.description: Represents the user-defined collection of featured products that are meant to cross-sell or upsell with your product.

FeatrProdtRelaType.description: Defines how the featured product is related to the product.

FeaturedProductId.description: The ID of the featured product that is linked to the product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the user-defined collection of featured products.

ProductId.description: The ID of the product that your company sells.

Sequence.description: Defines the order in which featured products are displayed.
